A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie stinks. Don't believe the critics. I'm not even a big Star Wars franchise fan. TLJ what can I say \,bad directing\, bad script\, bad acting and how the hell did Leia make it thru the movie.Whats up with Yoda\, maybe can get his own comedy special on Netflix wiith lines like that. Not sure why they reintroduced Luke back into the Franchise . Luke didnt look that old to give up on life. He did look tired though. Why not just give him an honorable death. A story about Luke killed in battle told by Leia would have been better. Now I'll just remember him as a quitter.
